mapper.select: SELECT c.classCode as classCode, c.classTitle as classTitle, c.classStart as classStart, c.classOpenTime as classOpenTime, c.classEnd as classEnd, c.classCloseTime as classCloseTime, c.classInviteCode as classInviteCode FROM ClassMember cm JOIN Class c ON cm.classCode=c.classCode WHERE cm.email=#{email}
SELECT count(*) FROM classmember where email=#{param1} and classCode=#{param2}
